/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the city.
